meanings.definition: A skin eruption or rash, especially one occurring as a symptom of a disease.
meanings.sent1: The doctor diagnosed the patient with exanthemata after examining the red rash on their skin.
meanings.sent2: The exanthemata on his arm was itchy and uncomfortable.
meanings.sent3: The exanthemata seemed to dance across her skin like tiny red stars.
meanings.sent4: The sudden appearance of exanthemata was like a warning sign of the underlying illness.
meanings.sent5: The exanthemata covered her body like a blanket of red dots, signaling the presence of a disease.
